main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in Richfield, Ohio in April and May of 1956 and 1960.
interesting points: Three objects were observed for 30-40 minutes on 4 April 1956, with no conclusive characteristics determined., Four residents observed a moon-shaped luminous object approximately 25 to 30 feet in diameter on 5 May 1960., The luminous object appeared to allow two or four Air Force jets to pass through it., A witness mentioned it was not her first time observing similar objects, which always emitted beams of light., The report highlights the lack of sufficient details for conclusive identification.
witness description: residents of Richfield, including a woman writing a book
